name: Melter Man
description: The Toys have taken over! MELT their cute little faces, VACUUM them up, and SHOOT them out to rebuild the environment and SAVE the Toy Factory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.00 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Remember to use a controller! The game plays much better with it IMHO!  Super fun game!
